keyMoments.title: Sanji Defeats Kuroobi
keyMoments.description: Crew cook Sanji defeats one of Arlong's three officers, demonstrating the strength of the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Straw Hats can defeat the Arlong Pirates' strongest members.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Defeats Chew
keyMoments.description: Crew sniper Usopp defeats another of Arlong's officers through clever tactics and bravery.
keyMoments.significance: Proves that every member of the Straw Hats contributes to the crew's success.

keyMoments.title: Nami Commits to the Crew
keyMoments.description: Nami openly defies Arlong and commits to fighting alongside the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Nami's full emotional commitment to joining the Straw Hat Pirates.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Kuroobi Defeated
keyMoments.description: One of the three officers of the Arlong Pirates is defeated by Sanji, weakening the crew significantly.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the Arlong Pirates' downfall.

keyMoments.title: Chew Defeated
keyMoments.description: Another officer of the Arlong Pirates is defeated by Usopp, further diminishing the crew's strength.
keyMoments.significance: Leaves only Arlong himself as the remaining major threat.

jollyRoger.description: A saw-shark face with a crown-like fin on top
